00020 class CorrInputMech
00021 {
00022 protected:

00024     template <class TypeImpl> void perform_calculations(TypeImpl & neuron);
00025     const Volt & potential_impl() const {
00026         return rate_;

00030     double rate_;

00041 template <class CorrInputMechConfigType>
00042 CorrInputMech<CorrInputMechConfigType>::CorrInputMech(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00043         : cimcfg_(dynamic_cast<CorrInputMechConfigType *>(configurator))
00044         , rate_(0.)
00045 {
00046     if (! cimcfg_) throw ConfigError("CorrInputMech: void configurator");

00050 // updates the mechanism of CorrInputMech (similar to a Poisson mechanism)
00051 template <class CorrInputMechConfigType>
00052 template <class TypeImpl>
00053 void CorrInputMech<CorrInputMechConfigType>::perform_calculations(TypeImpl & neuron)
00054 {
00055     if (cimcfg_->correlated_event_state())
00056         rate_ = cimcfg_->rate_when_correlated();
00057     else
00058         rate_ = cimcfg_->rate_when_not_correlated();
00059 
00060     if (RandomGenerator::probability_trial_for_time_step(rate_))  // presentrate in  Hz.
00061         neuron.notify_firing_impl(0);
00062 //      static_cast<TypeImpl &>(*this).notify_firing_impl( SpikeTimeGenerator::gen_.generate_value() );
00063 }
